SELECT BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, BOARDDATE, MEMBERID, REPORTDEADLINE
FROM BOARDS WHERE boards.boardcategory = #{categoryType} and reportnoticeid is null ORDER BY BOARDDATE DESC OFFSET (#{pager.pageNo} - 1) * #{pager.rowsPerPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pager.rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(BOARDID) AS "count" FROM BOARDS WHERE BOARDCATEGORY = #{categoryType} and reportnoticeid is null

select boards.BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, BOARDDATE, BOARDCATEGORY, REPORTDEADLINE, SUBMISSIONSUBMITDATE, SUBMISSIONSCORE, boards.MEMBERID, membername from boards left join members on boards.memberid = members.memberid where boards.BOARDID=#{boardId}
select nvl(max(boards.boardid),0) as boardid FROM boards

select BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, BOARDDATE, BOARDCATEGORY, REPORTDEADLINE, SUBMISSIONSUBMITDATE, SUBMISSIONSCORE, MEMBERID, REPORTDEADLINETIME, REPORTNOTICEID from boards where memberId=#{memberId} and REPORTNOTICEID=#{reportNoticeId}

select BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, BOARDDATE, BOARDCATEGORY, REPORTDEADLINE, SUBMISSIONSUBMITDATE, SUBMISSIONSCORE, boards.MEMBERID, REPORTDEADLINETIME, REPORTNOTICEID, MEMBERNAME from boards left join members on boards.memberid = members.memberid where REPORTNOTICEID=#{boardId}
mapper.insert: insert into boards ( BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, BOARDDATE, BOARDCATEGORY, SUBMISSIONSUBMITDATE, MEMBERID, REPORTNOTICEID ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARDID.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, #{boardCategory}, sysdate, #{memberId}, #{reportNoticeId} )

insert into boards ( BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, BOARDDATE, BOARDCATEGORY, REPORTDEADLINE, MEMBERID, REPORTDEADLINETIME ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARDID.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, #{boardCategory}, #{reportDeadline}, #{memberId}, #{reportDeadlineTime} )
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from boards where memberId=#{memberId} and REPORTNOTICEID=#{reportNoticeId}
mapper.update: update boards set BOARDTITLE =#{boardTitle}, BOARDCONTENT =#{boardContent}, BOARDCATEGORY = #{boardCategory}, MEMBERID =#{memberId} WHERE boardid=#{boardId}

update boards set BOARDTITLE =#{boardTitle}, BOARDCONTENT =#{boardContent}, BOARDDATE = sysdate, BOARDCATEGORY = #{boardCategory}, MEMBERID =#{memberId}, REPORTDEADLINE =#{reportDeadline}, REPORTDEADLINETIME=#{reportDeadlineTime} WHERE boardid=#{boardId}
